1100100.name: Super Web Kittens: Act I Demo
1100100.description:
THE DEMO

Free Super Web Kittens: Act I demoversion, featuring the first scene of the game. The demo lasts for half an hour and shows what you can expect from the full game.

INFO: You can save your progress and continue playing after buying the full version!

SUPER WEB KITTENS — More about the full game

Super Web Kittens is a visual novel styled game about pets and their owners, living in a dystopian caste-based society.
The game is focused on the distinctive characters, humor and unusual storyline.
